Details: Two members of the engineering teams were killed by Islamic State militants.[1]
Four bombs killed two people and injured another seven in Sha'ab, a neighbourhood of Baghdad.[2]
A five-year-old girl from the Embera indigenous community died. Her mother was also injured.[3]
Insurgents killed at least one person.[4]
One soldier was killed and three others were injured Wednesday in an early morning explosion in south Thailand.[5]

Several women committed suicide bombings that killed four Libyan soldiers and two other women. The victims had previously granted them safe passage to leave buildings under the control of Islamic State militants.[6]
Four men were executed by Islamic State.[7]

The Taliban executed a fourth-year student of Kabul Polytechnic University in Sewaka village, 60 km from Kabul. Faiz ul Rahman Wardak was accused of being involved of the assassination of a Taliban intelligence officer, Mullah Mirwais, and was hanged for this accusation.[8]
Two soldiers were killed and eight others were injured, when a group of militants opened fire on a convoy.[9]
At least 24 people were killed in an attack by the Islamic State militant group in the Iraqi city of Mosul on Saturday.[10]
At least two persons were shot dead by unidentified armed men riding a motorcycle in Lond Khor area of Mardan.[11]
The Islamic State executed 11 persons, including a whole family, for trying to flee its areas.[12]
Islamic State executed a homosexual man in the city of Aleppo.[13]
Terrorists launched two suicide vehicles towards army lines. 9 soldiers were killed.[14]
Insurgent shoot dead one soldier.[15]
Conflict: Syrian Civil War spillover in Lebanon

Details: A bomb kills at least 3 civilians in Jumuma, a village in Paktika Province.[16]
A CRPF trooper was killed and another wounded as Maoists set off three Improvised Explosive Device (IED) blasts and fired at separate places in Chhattisgarh's Bastar on Tuesday.[17]
Al-Qaeda militants attacked a prison. Two guards were injured. Dozens of prisoners have escaped.[18]

A soldier was killed while a policeman was wounded in separate clashes between government forces and suspected members of the Maute group in Butig, Lanao del Sur, a military official said Tuesday.[19]

Location: Pattani Province and Narathiwat Province, Thailand
Details: Suspected insurgents shot dead six people in a series of attacks carried out Tuesday and Wednesday in south Thailand.[20]
An Islamic State suicide bomber blew himself up near a hospital, killing 20 soldiers.[21]
Terrorists launched a \double-tap\" car bombing outside the Benghazi headquarters of Saiqa Special Force. The two blasts appear to have killed nobody outright but left 22 people injured.[22]"
Islamic State group jihadists killed at least 26 members of Syrian government forces today in an assault on regime positions in the central province of Homs.[23]
Separate bombings in the Iraqi capital killed 10 people and wounded another 22.[24]
Six police officers and a civilian were killed in a bombing near a checkpoint in the Egyptian capital. Three additional officers and four civilians were wounded by the blast.[25][26]
Madagali suicide bombings: Officials say 2 explosions in Madagali a town Nigeria have killed 57 and injured 177.[27]
A civilian died and another 3 were injured in bombing attack.[28][29]
At least 4 civilians die in shooting in Parwan Province.[30]
A bomb killed at least 2 people in Somalia.[31]
Three members of Abu Sayyaf, including a leader, were killed in a shooting between the police and the militant. The shooting occurred in Malaysia.[32]
Insurgents killed one officer in Peshawar.[33][34]
December 2016 Aden suicide bombings: 50 Yemeni soldiers were killed and another 70 were injured in a suicide bombing attack.[35]
December 2016 Istanbul bombings: Two bombs killed 44 and injured at least 155 people in Istanbul.[36]
Islamic State militants executed an Iraqi journalist in central Mosul.[37]
Boko Haram Attack Leaves 3 Dead and 17 Injured in Borno.[38]
At least three people in separate shootings in Quetta.[39]
Four border patrol police officers were hospitalized in south Thailand on Monday, when a remote controlled bomb exploded near their vehicle.[40]
December 2016 Mogadishu suicide bombing: At least 29 people died and another 50 were injured in a suicide bombing attack on a police station near Mogadishu's port.[41]
Botroseya Church bombing: At least 27 people were killed and 47 injured after an explosion in a Coptic cathedral in Cairo.[42][43]
3 people were killed in two suicide bombing attack in Maiduguri.[44]
Two car bombing kills at least 8 people in Fallujah.[45]
5 people were executed by Islamic State militants.[46]
11 men were executed, al Qaeda were suspected.[47]
At least four people were killed and 10 injured in a bomb blast in Kismayo, south of Mogadishu.[48]
A bomb killed one and another 3 were injured in North Waziristan.[49]
A military vehicle struck a roadside bomb during a security swoop in North Sinai's city of Sheikh Zuweid, killing four soldiers.[50]
A senior commander of the Afghan Border Police forces was killed in an explosion in eastern Kunar province.[51]

The Islamic State terror group claimed that it was responsible for firing two missiles on Monday from the Sinai Peninsula, aimed at an Israeli border crossing with Egypt but which missed the mark and landed in Egyptian territory.[52]
Three people were killed in hand grenade attacks on a restaurant Sunday evening in southern Somalia, police confirmed on Monday.[53]
Nine people were injured on Monday when suspected militants attacked the office of National Party (NP) in Balochistan's Turbat district, police officials said.[54]
A bomb kills 3 civilians and another 2 were wounded in Zabul Province.[55]
16 civilians were executed by Islamic State militants.[56]
Boko Haram militants attacked a military base in Borno state village of Kamuya leaving scores dead.[57]
Two people died and 23 were injured when unknown assailants threw a grenade into a bar early Tuesday in Colombia's most southwestern city, Tumaco.[58]
A policeman died Tuesday during an operation in the town of Apachita in Vraem region.[59]
75 civilians were executed by Islamic State militants.[60]

At least three policemen killed, nine injured in military ambush. The first ambush occurred at Lokchao, 21 km from the border town of Moreh and the second ambush took place at Bongyang area of the same district.[61]
A civilian was wounded on Wednesday when two IEDs exploded in central Baghdad.[62]
Two police officers, and a 12-year-old boy were stabbed in the head with a screwdriver.[63]
Two Colombian policemen were killed in an ELN guerrilla attack in the town of Saravena, Arauca department (border with Venezuela), confirmed that institution.[64]
Two policeman (another was seriously injured)and four other narcoterrorist died after a clash in the Vraem region, known for hosting remnants of Sendero Luminoso and the high traffic of drugs.[65]
The Islamic State execute a young Peshmerga fighter.[66]

An assailant sent a message via Twitter to Kurt Eichenwald, a Newsweek journalist, in Dallas, Texas, United States. The message contained the text \You deserve a seizure for your posts\" and a GIF image of a strobe. Eichenwald, who has epilepsy, suffered a seizure and was incapacitated for several days. No group claimed responsibility for the incident
Perpetrator: however, authorities arrested John Rayne Rivello in connection with the attack.\"[67]"

Details: A bombing at a Mogadishu tea shop left at least 5 Somali soldiers dead.[68]
Three people have been killed in a bomb attack at a police station in the Syrian capital, Damascus.[69]
At least five people have been wounded Thursday in a suicide car bomb attack targeting a Mogadishu restaurant regularly frequented by journalists, according to authorities and eyewitnesses.[70]
2016 Nassoumbou attack: Several dozen heavily armed gunmen attacked an army outpost near the border with Mali, leaving at least 12 soldiers dead and 2 others missing.[71]
Insurgents from Taliban group killed one in Kabul Province.[72]
Terrorist shoot dead one in Logar Province.[73]
Five female security staff and their driver were killed by unknown gunmen near Kandahar Airport.[74]
2016 Kayseri bombing: A suspected car bombing killed 14 soldiers aboard a bus and wounded at least 55 others.[75]

Four militants attacked a policeman, seized his car, and ran over another policeman who tried to stop the vehicle, killing him.[76][77] Other police officers opened fire at the militants and liquidated them.[78]ISIL claimed responsibility for the attack.[79]
A member of the civilian Joint Task Force (JTF) was injured during operations against Boko Haram.[80]
Eight African Coalition Forces were killed by Boko Haram militants.[81]
Insurgents killed at least 3 soldiers in Pampore.[82]
Shooting left at least six people dead.[83]
An Islamic State suicide bomber carries out a car bomb attack on Iraqi forces.[84]
A rocket-propelled grenade was on Sunday launched on a civilian minibus in southern Somalia, killing six people, in Lower Shebelle.[85]
December 2016 Aden suicide bombings: At least 52 Yemeni soldiers collecting their salaries at a base in northeast Aden were killed when a suicide bomber detonated.[86]

2016 Al-Karak attack: Insurgents attacked police and civilians in Al-Karak, Jordan, then took shelter in the Kerak Castle. 12 people were killed and 35 were injured, most of whom were Jordanian security forces and civilians. A Canadian tourist was also killed.[87]
Conflict: Spillover of the Syrian Civil War in Jordan

Details: At least seven people were killed and eight wounded when a suicide bomber targeted forces loyal to Libya's eastern government in Benghazi.[88]
A car bombing attack kills one soldier from Turkey in al-Bab city.[89]
An Islamic State militant beheads an Afghan militiaman working with the SAA at the T4 Military Airport near Homs, Syria.[90]
Insurgent shoot dead 3 people and another 3 were injured.[91]
Two soldiers were shot dead in an attack perpetrated by members of the ELN, close of the location of Arauca, in the Northern.[92]
A bomb killed 1 and another 22 were injured in Kunduz.[93]
2 people die in bombing attack.[94]

Three Ukrainian soldiers were killed and four others wounded in a new clash with units of the People's Militia (MP) of the self-proclaimed People's Luhansk People's Republic (RPL), which took place in the area of Debáltsevo, RIA Novosti MP of the RPL, Andrei Marochko.[95]

Mai Mai militiamen on Monday morning killed a UN peacekeeper during an attack on Butembo town in North Kivu province, in the eastern part of the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC). Two peacekeepers were also injured in the attack while five militia fighters were also killed and two others captured, according to police.[96]

Assassination of Andrei Karlov: A gunman killed Russian ambassador in Turkey and three bystanders were also injured.[97] According to the Egyptian newspaper Al-Youm Al-Sabea, the Army of Conquest claimed responsibility for the assassination.[98]
Conflict: Spillover of the Syrian Civil War in Turkey

Details: At least three minors belonging to the indigenous community E'ñepá were killed after being hit by the explosion of a fragmentary grenade in the town of Caicara del Orinoco, located in the municipality Cedeño northeast of Bolívar. The explosion of the object also left two wounded, identified as Juana Torres Luciani of 19 years and a minor of 8 years.[99]
Bombings killed 1 and another 8 were injured.[100]

2016 Berlin attack: 12 people have died after a truck ploughed into a Christmas market in Berlin, German police have said. The Islamic State claimed responsibility for the attack.[101][102] On 21 December, police announced a nationwide search for a specific suspect, after personal documents of a Tunisian man, apparently a notice for temporary stay in Germany, were found in the lorry's cab. Later that day the police announced that it had been stepped up to a Europe-wide search. According to investigators, the suspect entered Germany from Italy in 2015 and belonged to a Salafist network with the name True Religion, around recently interred Abu Walaa, who was known as a recruiter for the Islamic State in Germany.[103] The perpetrator was found by police in Milan, Italy four days later and was killed in a shootout with police. One officer was wounded.[104]
Four fishing boat crew were reportedly abducted off Sulu.[105]

An assailant opened fire outside the United States embassy in Ankara, Turkey. There were no reported casualties in the attack, and the assailant was arrested at the scene. No group claimed responsibility for the incident.[106]
A shooting by Al Shabaab terrorist group left one dead in Puntland.[107]
A twin bomb attack on the headquarters of an Iranian Kurdish party based in northern Iraq has killed seven people.[108]
Perpetrator: Army of the Guardians of the Islamic Revolution (suspected)

Details: A Canadian and a Briton were killed by Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant near Raqqa.[109][110]
Eight people are killed and another six were injured in a Taliban attack on Afghan Member of Parliament Mir Wali's home in Helmand Province.[111][112]
Six gunmen on motorcycles attacked Saye's military soldier and shot the gendarmes on the scene, one soldier was killed and several were wounded.[113]
Three suicide car bombings kills at least 23 people in Mosul.[114]
Part of Battle of al-Bab: the death toll of Turkish soldiers in Syria's Al-Bab has increased to 16, Defense Minister Fikri Isik said on Thursday.[115]
At least three Policemen were injured in an ELN guerrilla attack in the department of Cesar (north), which also killed a guerrilla.[116]
Two Turkish soldiers were burned to death in the Aleppo countryside.[117]

Afriqiyah Airways Flight 209: A commercial jet that took of from Libya was reportedly hijacked by individuals with explosives. The plane has landed in Malta. The hijackers were pro-Gaddafi militants and belonged to the Brigade 93 militant group and demanded the recognition of their group.[118]
Insurgents shoot dead seven and another six were injured.[119]
A 50-year-old man was lightly wounded in a stabbing attack outside his home in the West Bank.[120]

Islamic State executed a man in Syria's northeastern Raqqa city on charges of smuggling citizens to areas beyond the group's contro and two Western soldiers in Syria's northeastern Raqqa city.[121][122]
Car bombs have killed more than 30 people.[123]
At least 11 policemen were killed.[124]
Insurgents kills 4 policemen.[125]

One soldier was killed and another wounded in a shootout of suspected guerrillas from the National Liberation Army (ELN, guevarista) in a rural area of the department of Arauca, eastern Colombia, was officially reported Saturday.[126]
A Frenchwoman was abducted in the city of Gao.[127]
Insurgents kills one policemen and another four were injured.[128]
10 people were killed in a series of attacks in Mosul.[129]
At least 16 people, including a police officer, were injured in a blast outside a Catholic church in the southern Philippines.[130]

Location: North Kivu, Democratic Republic of the Congo
Details: At least 13 people were killed in shooting and stabbing by insurgents in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.[131]
Separate bombings in and around Baghdad have killed at least 11 civilians and wounded 34 others.[132]
A suicide bombing attack left at least 2 people dead and injured 5 others in Mora.[133]
A roadside bomb has killed at least two civilians in Afghanistan's eastern Laghman Province.[134]
A suicide bombing attack killed one police in Lashkargah.[135]
A bomb killed 1 and 6 others were injured in Kasra district. A blast left 1 dead.[136]
Islamic State kills at least 30 people in al-Bab.[137]
Two suicide bombers struck in Maiduguri.Only one of the attackers was said to have died, as the other was reportedly captured before striking.[138]
Islamic State group executed seven civilians for collaborating with security forces.[139]
7 civilians were killed and 3 wounded in the explosion of a booby-trapped vehicle.[140]
A woman has reportedly been beheaded by a group of armed men in Afghanistan after she entered a city without her husband.
An explosion killed a local official in Lebanon.[141]
Conflict: Syrian Civil War spillover in Lebanon

Details: One soldier was killed on Dec. 28 during clashes with outlawed Kurdistan Workers’ Party (PKK) militants in the eastern province of Tunceli, Dogan News Agency has reported.[142][143]
An explosion in Kabul reportedly leads to casualties. Afghan police state that the attack was aimed at a member of the National Assembly.[144][145]
Perpetrator: Islamic State – Khorasan Province or Taliban (suspected)

Details: Three suicide bombers killed by police in Moyu, Khotan prefecture in Xinjiang after ramming their vehicle into government complex. The attack killed an official and a security worker and 3 were injured.[146]
Islamic State executed a Palestinian girl after accusing her of supporting the Syrian regime.[147]
Islamic State executed three youths for collaborating with security forces.[148]
2016 Hilongos bombings: Two bombs injured 33 people who were attending an amateur boxing match in the town of Hilongos.[149]
A bomb exploded on a highway on the island of Mindanao, in Aleosan, wounding six people.[149]
The head of the Sikh community in Afghanistan's restive Kunduz city was shot dead by unidentified gunmen.[150]
Perpetrator: Islamic State – Khorasan Province or Taliban (suspected)

Details: One policeman has been killed and at least six others injured in an attack on a police checkpoint north of the capital Bogotá.[151]
A bomb kills one and 10 others were injured.[152]
Militants attack Army patrol, 2 jawans injured. The militants fired at the Army patrol in the morning at Gulshan mollah locality of Shahgund in the kashmir region.[153]
At least seven people including three (NISA) soldiers and four Al-Shabaab militants were killed after heavy fighting between the Somalian army and Al-Shabaab in Afgoye town, officials said.[154]
A suicide bombing injures at least 2 people in Rahim Yar Khan.[155]

A car bombing (car was damaged by shrapnel, but no one was injured) and a shooting (militants ambushed and shot at the car of a 51-year-old villager who was driving along a local road) have shaken south Thailand.[156]
Between 2 and 11 police were killed by insurgents in Farah.[157]
December 2016 Baghdad bombings: Bombings left at least 25 people dead and 50 others were injured in Baghdad.[158]

An improvised explosive device exploded outside a municipal gymnasium in the southern Philippines where a gathering for peace and unity was held on New Year's Eve, no one injured in blast outside municipal gymnasium.[159]
A police officer and a soldier were killed when a remote controlled bomb was detonated as their armored car passed by it.[160]
